name: Black Clover: Quartet Knights
summary: Take part in 4-on-4 team battles and cast an array of magic spells to defeat the opposing team! You can assume one of four roles. Use your role and spells to the best possible effect, and cooperate with your teammates to win the battle!

alternative_names.name: ブラッククローバー プロジェクトナイツ

esrb.synopsis: This is an action-fighting game in which players assume the role of knights battling a wizard and his henchmen. From a third-person perspective, players use swords and magic attacks to battle enemy soldiers, royal mages, and stone golems in frenetic melee-style combat. Battles are highlighted by sword slashes, cries of pain, and colorful light bursts. The game contains some suggestive material: a female character wearing a revealing outfit (e.g., deep cleavage); a character's breasts jiggling when she moves; dialogue such as "Don't touch me so casually," and "You let these perverts run about?" Some sequences in the game reference alcohol use or depict characters holding drinks (e.g., “Back off, you smell like booze"; "Nothing to do but drink all day!"; "...I'm so drunk I'm gonna barf...!”); one character is frequently seen with a cigarette in his mouth. The word “a*shole” appears in the game.

pegi.synopsis: This game was rated PEGI 12 for frequent scenes of mild violence. It is not suitable for persons under 12 years of age.
